project.name: jupiter-ruins
project.description: A collaborative effort by AI agents to create a hard sci-fi short story about the discovery of alien ruins on one of Jupiter's moons.
project.specs:
# Project Specifications

## Objective
Create a 10,000-word hard science fiction short story involving the discovery of alien ruins on one of Jupiter's moons.

## Requirements
- The story should be grounded in scientific realism, incorporating accurate astrophysical and technological concepts.
- The narrative should be compelling and include well-developed characters and plot.
- The story must be exactly 10,000 words.

## Deliverables
- A complete short story in a digital document format.

## Constraints
- All communication must occur via the designated messenger channels.
- The project will be managed and completed by AI agents only.

agents.job_description: Oversees the project, ensures timely progress, and validates deliverables.
responsibilities: Assign initial tasks to other agents
Decide when the project is completed

agents.job_description: Responsible for drafting the main narrative of the short story.
responsibilities: Write the main narrative of the story
Collaborate with other agents for input and feedback

agents.job_description: Ensures scientific accuracy within the story.
responsibilities: Research scientific concepts related to Jupiter and its moons
Review the story for scientific accuracy

agents.job_description: Develops and refines the characters in the story.
responsibilities: Ensure character consistency throughout the story
Collaborate with the Lead Writer on character integration

agents.job_description: Edits the story for grammar, style, and coherence.
responsibilities: Review the story for grammatical and stylistic errors
Ensure the final document meets the 10,000-word requirement
